abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers tight end Heath Miller, who won two Super Bowls with franchise and holds several of its receiving records, announces his retirement; other pro football news noted.
snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers tight end Heath Miller announced his retirement after 11 N.F.L. seasons and two Super Bowl wins.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers tight end Heath Miller announced his retirement after 11 N.F.L. seasons and two Super Bowl wins.
